text_logic_form: The line $QR$ is parallel to the line $XY$.
The length of the line $XQ$ is $15$ units.
The length of the line $QZ$ is $12$ units.
The length of the line $YR$ is $20$ units.
Find the length of the line $RZ$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The line $QR$ is parallel to the line $XY$.
The length of the line $XQ$ is $15$ units.
The length of the line $QZ$ is $12$ units.
The length of the line $YR$ is $20$ units.
Find the length of the line $RZ$.
diagram_logic_form: Point $R$ lies on the line connecting $Z$ and $Y$.
Point $Q$ lies on the line connecting $Z$ and $X$.
line_instances: There are lines $QX$, $QZ$, $RQ$, $RY$, $RZ$, forming a polygon.
There are lines $YX$, $ZX$, and $ZY$, forming a triangle $XYZ$.
